preqs: Two gateway units in Literary studies, or permission from the unit coordinator.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS1903, ATS1904}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ATS3410, AZA2410, AZA3410}

description: The unit will investigate story-telling, narrative literature and the role of narrative in a range of cultural contexts. What constitutes narrative? What are its primary features? How does story-telling communicate meaning? How do we construct effective narrative texts? What do we do with narrative? What is the future of narrative? The texts studied are drawn from a variety of genres and countries.
